text: Edward Ford "Ed" Weber (July 26, 1931 â€“ February 27, 2023) was an American politician. He served one term in the United States House of Representatives as a Republican from January 3, 1981 through January 3, 1983. He won his district in 1980 due to Ronald Reagan's success in Ohio in the 1980 presidential election. In 1982, however, he lost his re-election bid to Marcy Kaptur. He died on February 27, 2023, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2023 deaths Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Politicians from Toledo, Ohio Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Ed Weber
